code: import axios from"axios";export const productApis={getAllProducts:async params=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_BE_URL,"products"),{params:{...params}});return response;},getProductsById:async productId=>{const{data}=await axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_BE_URL,"products/").concat(productId));return data;},getAllImgsProduct:async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_BE_URL,"imgsProducts"));return response.data;},updateProductById:async(idProduct,productUpdate)=>{const response=await axios.patch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_BE_URL,"products/").concat(idProduct),productUpdate);return response.data;},createProduct:async()=>{},deleteProductById:async()=>{}};
